_sText:
originally I was gonna quit mapping for awhile after releasing viridis. however, that only lasted a couple days lol. not too sure what made me want to make this but nonetheless, here it is.

map is loosely set in "rome". I did look at real pictures and locations when making some of these but they're more or less inspired by them instead of copying. also yes I know the houses kind of look like hotels/motels. don't hate me.

map features 4 stages

stage 1 - poor mans st peters square
stage 2 - road/neighborhood with a roman villa in the center
stage 3 - outside of a pantheon in rome
stage 4 - inside the pantheon. honestly the theme for this stage isn't as unique as the others ones, but it still looks good. I also added a little "visitors" center at the end of it lol. The end of stage 4 is a small little neighborhood with houses as well.
bonus - looks the same as stage 4

Not entirely sure what an optimized run of this could be. Samurai got around 1:20 unoptimized with stages 1-3, so i'm going to assume it'll be around 1:50. bonus is around 15-20 seconds.

lastly, in my opinion, the map looks better when its slightly darker. I would put it around 40-50% brightness
